property.name: tez.lib.uris
property.description: The location of the Tez libraries which will be localized for DAGs

property.name: tez.am.log.level
property.description: Root Logging level passed to the Tez app master

property.name: tez.staging-dir
property.description: The staging dir used while submitting DAGs

property.name: tez.am.resource.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to be used by the AppMaster

property.name: tez.am.java.opts
property.description: Java options for the Tez AppMaster process. The -Xmx parameter value is generally 0.8 times tez.am.resource.memory.mb config.

property.name: tez.am.shuffle-vertex-manager.min-src-fraction
property.description: In case of a ScatterGather connection, the fraction of source tasks which should complete before tasks for the current vertex are schedule

property.name: tez.am.shuffle-vertex-manager.max-src-fraction
property.description: In case of a ScatterGather connection, once this fraction of source tasks have completed, all tasks on the current vertex can be scheduled. Number of tasks ready for scheduling on the current vertex scales linearly between min-fraction and max-fraction

property.name: tez.am.am-rm.heartbeat.interval-ms.max
property.description: The maximum heartbeat interval between the AM and RM in milliseconds

property.name: tez.am.grouping.split-waves
property.description: The multiplier for available queue capacity when determining number of tasks for a Vertex. 1.4 with 100% queue available implies generating a number of tasks roughly equal to 140% of the available containers on the queue

property.name: tez.am.grouping.min-size
property.description: Lower bound on the size (in bytes) of a grouped split, to avoid generating too many splits

property.name: tez.am.grouping.max-size
property.description: Upper bound on the size (in bytes) of a grouped split, to avoid generating excessively large split

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.enabled
property.description: Configuration to specify whether container should be reused

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.rack-fallback.enabled
property.description: Whether to reuse containers for rack local tasks. Active only if reuse is enabled

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.non-local-fallback.enabled
property.description: Whether to reuse containers for non-local tasks. Active only if reuse is enabled

property.name: tez.am.container.session.delay-allocation-millis
property.description: The amount of time to hold on to a container if no task can be assigned to it immediately. Only active when reuse is enabled. Set to -1 to never release a container in a session

property.name: tez.am.container.reuse.locality.delay-allocation-millis
property.description: The amount of time to wait before assigning a container to the next level of locality. NODE -> RACK -> NON_LOCAL

property.name: tez.task.get-task.sleep.interval-ms.max
property.description: The maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait before a task asks an AM for another task

property.name: tez.am.env
property.value: LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib/hadoop/lib/native:/usr/lib/hadoop/lib/native/`$JAVA_HOME/bin/java -d32 -version &> /dev/null;if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo Linux-i386-32; else echo Linux-amd64-64;fi`
property.description: Additional execution environment entries for tez. This is not an additive property. You must preserve the original value if you want to have access to native libraries.

property.name: tez.session.client.timeout.secs
property.description: Time (in seconds) to wait for AM to come up when trying to submit a DAG from the client

property.name: tez.session.am.dag.submit.timeout.secs
property.description: Time (in seconds) for which the Tez AM should wait for a DAG to be submitted before shutting down

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-output.should-compress
property.description: Whether intermediate output should be compressed or not

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-output.compress.codec
property.description: The coded to be used if compressing intermediate output. Only applicable if tez.runtime.intermediate-output.should-compress is enabled.

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-input.is-compressed
property.description: Whether intermediate input is compressed

property.name: tez.runtime.intermediate-input.compress.codec
property.description: The coded to be used when reading intermediate compressed input. Only applicable if tez.runtime.intermediate-input.is-compressed is enabled.

property.name: tez.yarn.ats.enabled
property.description: Whether to send history events to YARN Application Timeline Server
